avengersList.name: Iron Man
avengersList.abilities: Genius-level intellect, Proficient scientist and engineer, Utilizes powered armor suit

avengersList.name: Hulk
avengersList.abilities: Superhuman strength, durability, regeneration, resistance to injury, genius-level intellect (as Bruce Banner)

avengersList.name: Captain America
avengersList.abilities: Peak human strength, agility, endurance, master tactician, expert martial artist, wields vibranium shield
avengersList.teamAffiliation: Avengers, S.H.I.E.L.D., Invaders, Secret Avengers, Illuminati

avengersList.name: Thor
avengersList.abilities: Superhuman strength, durability, longevity, weather manipulation, flight, wields Mjolnir
avengersList.teamAffiliation: Avengers, Warriors Three, Asgardians, God Squad, Thor Corps

avengersList.name: Hawkeye
avengersList.abilities: Master archer, expert marksman, hand-to-hand combatant, acrobat, tactician

avengersList.name: Black Widow

avengersList.teamAffiliation: Avengers, S.H.I.E.L.D., KGB, Champions, Secret Avengers
